mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHSHOP ( CNO, ORDERDATE, ORI_200, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_200, ERL_500, ERL_1000, SNS_200, SNS_500, SNS_1000, GUBUN, SALEPATH, ORDERER, COMM, MANAGER ) VALUES ( PURCHSHOP_PK.NEXTVAL, #{orderDate}, #{ori_200}, #{ori_500}, #{ori_1000}, #{erl_200}, #{erl_500}, #{erl_1000}, #{sns_200}, #{sns_500}, #{sns_1000}, #{gubun}, #{salePath}, #{orderer}, #{comm}, #{manager} )
